long_description: This OnGuard Doberman Combination cable lock uses a 10mm cable to balance weight, flexibility and convenience when securing your bicycle. The 6 ft. long, 10mm thick cable is made of braided steel to offer cut resistance and is self-coiling for convenience; vinyl coating helps protect finishes. Integrated, resettable 4-digit combination lock has 10,000 possible variations; lock is permanently forged to the cable for added security. Includes a versatile mounting bracket for hassle-free transportation and storage. OnGuard rates the Doberman Combination cable lock as a 30 out of 100 on their 100-point security rating system, where higher-rated locks offer increased security.
short_description: This OnGuard Doberman Combination cable lock uses a 10mm cable to balance weight, flexibility and convenience when securing your bicycle.
